Summary: Happened really fast, sooo strange and unexplainable
divs: Sighting Details1) I was in my backyard with my boyfriend having a smoke. 2)we were actually looking at the stars and talking about them , when they appeared out of no where. 3)At first i thought it was a shooting star but then i realised it was 4-5 objects in a diagonal line going straight. 4)They appeared out of no where , at first i thought it was a shooting star until i realise there were 4-5 objects on a perfect diagonal but going straight ... my bf also believed they were connected to eachother. 5) i freaked out wanting to go inside , because it hasnt been the first time i've seen something creepy like that , while my bf was excited and amazed that he finally saw something like that. I was shocked that we both saw the same thing. My bf is obsessed with space and stars and is really smart when it comes to those things and was trying to think of possible explanations to what we saw but he couldn't think of one that would be possible. 6) from the angle of the sky we saw them on there is a huge pine tree that blocked our view but also it seemed like the disingrated really fast . it was all soo fast that we couldnt even take it in.
